thread.title: 'Golden State Killer' appears in California court

title: 'Golden State Killer' appears in California court
text:
'Golden State Killer' appears in California court 3:38am IST - 01:15
Joseph James DeAngelo, 72, charged with murder in connection with a string of rapes and killings across California attributed to the ''Golden State Killer'' made a brief initial court appearance on Friday, sitting in a wheelchair and speaking in a hoarse voice. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
Joseph James DeAngelo, 72, charged with murder in connection with a string of rapes and killings across California attributed to the "Golden State Killer" made a brief initial court appearance on Friday, sitting in a wheelchair and speaking in a hoarse voice.
